metadata.dc:author: Melgarejo Moreno, P J
Hellín Meseguer, D
Alpay, F
metadata.dc:description: Inferior nasoantral windows, with and without radical surgical removal of the maxillary sinus mucosa, were studied in ten New Zealand white rabbits. Surgical removal of the mucosa and the Caldwell-Luc operation were performed. After three months, the sinus cavity was smaller, the medial wall was retracted and the inner curtain was disturbed, and small antrostomies had closed.
metadata.dc:title: Alteraciones de la pared ósea del seno maxilar tras la intervención de Caldwell-Luc. Estudio experimental.
[Changes in the maxillary sinus wall after the Caldwell-Luc intervention. An experimental study].
